name: commonports
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool commonportnumbers.
Tool description: Get registered service names and transport protocols port numbers.
API description: Fetches registered service names and transport protocol port numbers based on given parameters using the Toolbench RapidAPI service.

port.description: The port number to query for (default is '53').

protocol.description: The transport protocol to query for (default is 'tcp').

service.description: The service name to query for (default is None).
